channel.title: Help with NPC's please
channel.description:
I am just wondering, me and a friend are gonna do something pretty big, but its fun.
For that we need to make npc's do emotes, so i wanna ask u guys, is it possible to make npc's do emotes?
If they can, and u know how, please tell me :)
Thanks, Maxie35.

item.title: Help with NPC's please
